name: NobleHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on the radiant heater”
”Alexa, turn off the fireplace”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
1. Download our "Noble Home" app and then register an account.
2. Configure your devices in the app and change their names.
3. Download the Amazon "Alexa" app from Amazon or from the Google Play Store or iOS App Store, and connect Echo to the "Alexa" app.
4. Search for the "Noble Home" skill in the Alexa app's skill category. 
5. Activate the skill, you will be directed to the login page.
6. Follow the instructions on the page to complete the link. 
7. You can control your devices with the following commands, for example:
- Alexa, turn on the fireplace/radiant heater.
- Alexa, turn off the fireplace/radiant heater.
- Alexa, turn on the heater of the fireplace.
- Alexa, turn off the heater of the fireplace.
- Alexa, dim the fireplace.
- Alexa, brighten the fireplace.
- Alexa, turn the light blue.
